translation.ja: NETFLIX オリジナル作品

translation.en: [Todd singing, clanging a pot] ♪ Joy to the world, Todd is here ♪
translation.ja: トッドさまの　　　おでましです

translation.en: ♪ He drank up all your beer ♪♪
translation.ja: ビール　ごちそうさまー

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, did I startle you with holiday cheer
translation.ja: 祝日だから一緒に酒飲んで

translation.en: and good will towards man?
translation.ja: 盛り上がろうぜ

translation.en: No, I just had this terrible dream that you were a person that existed
translation.ja: お前という人間が存在するという—

translation.en: and that you were in my room for some reason.
translation.ja: イヤな夢を見てた

translation.en: And then I woke up and it was true.
translation.ja: 起きたら現実だった

translation.en: Do you know what day it is?
translation.ja: 今日は何の日だ？

translation.en: Oh, shit, is it like our anniversary of that one day that I forgot to tell you how annoying you are?
translation.ja: お前がウザイって言い忘れた記念日？

translation.en: No, that was July 14th. You can remember it because it's also Bastille Day.
translation.ja: ハズレ！　それは革命記念日と同じ日だよ

translation.en: Christ, are you annoying.
translation.ja: ウザイ奴だ

translation.en: BoJack, it's Christmas!
translation.ja: ボージャッククリスマスだよ！

translation.en: Well, don't get too excited. I didn't get you shit.
translation.ja: 興奮するな　何も出ないぞ

translation.en: Ha! Shows what you know.
translation.ja: もう もらったぜ

translation.en: When you were passed out, I used your credit card to buy me this new hat.
translation.ja: お前が泥酔してる間にカードで帽子を買った

translation.en: Merry Christmas to me.
translation.ja: オレにメリークリスマス！

translation.en: It looks exactly like your old hat.
translation.ja: 同じ帽子じゃないか

translation.en: Yeah, it's my favorite kind of hat. Thanks, buddy!
translation.ja: そうさお気に入りなんだ

translation.en: Okay, great, Christmas transaction complete.
translation.ja: よかったな クリスマス終了　帰れ

translation.en: Please leave now.
translation.ja: クリスマス終了　帰れ

translation.en: Or we could watch Sabrina's Christmas Wish.
translation.ja: ねえ 一緒に見ようよ 「サブリナのクリスマスのお願い」 「サブリナのクリスマスのお願い」 「馬(ば)か騒ぎ」

translation.en: Hard pass.
translation.ja: イヤだ

translation.en: What? Come on, you love Horsin' Around.
translation.ja: 「馬(ば)か騒ぎ」好きだろ？

translation.en: Yeah, but I always skip the Christmas ones.
translation.ja: クリスマスの話は見ない

translation.en: Because the themes of family and togetherness are a chilling reminder of your own isolation?
translation.ja: 家族団らんものを見るのはつらいのか？

translation.en: No, but thank you for that.
translation.ja: 余計なお世話だ

translation.en: Todd, special holiday episodes are always stupid.
translation.ja: クリスマスの話はくだらない

translation.en: Cynical cash grabs by greedy corporations
translation.ja: スポンサーのカネがらみで

translation.en: looking to squeeze a few extra Nielsen points
translation.ja: お涙ちょうだいの—

translation.en: out of sentimental claptrap for mush-brained idiots
translation.ja: 低俗ドラマが定番なんだ

translation.en: who'd rather spend their Christmas watching a fake family on TV
translation.ja: 会話する家族もいない—

translation.en: than actually trying to have a conversation with their own dumb families.
translation.ja: さみしい奴らのために作るんだ

translation.en: I like it when people on TV hug each other.
translation.ja: 結構 感動シーンとかあるぜ

translation.en: Oh, come on, buddy! It's Christmas!
translation.ja: 楽しもうよクリスマスだぜ

translation.en: Fine, if it'll make you shut up,
translation.ja: 分かった お前を黙らせるために30分だけ見てやる

translation.en: I begrudgingly acquiesce to a half-hour of shared holiday acknowledgment,
translation.ja: お前を黙らせるために30分だけ見てやる

translation.en: but only because I get a residual check every time somebody watches one of them.
translation.ja: 見れば オレに印税が入るしな

translation.en: Hurray! Begrudging acquiescence!
translation.ja: ヤッター！　見ようぜ
“シカゴ初公演”

translation.en: ♪ Three little orphans, one, two, three ♪
translation.ja: 子供３人　ワンツースリー

translation.en: ♪ Without a home or a family tree ♪
translation.ja: 家も家族もなかった

translation.en: ♪ Until this horse said, "Live with me!" ♪
translation.ja: “オレと住もう”と　　　　　馬が言って

translation.en: ♪ And now we've got a new family ♪
translation.ja: みんな 家族になったのさ

translation.en: ♪ We're laughin' and learnin' and lovin' a lot ♪
translation.ja: 笑って学んで楽しんで 笑って学んで楽しんで “ジョエル･クラーク” 笑って学んで楽しんで

translation.en: ♪ Every new day is a dream ♪
translation.ja: 笑って学んで楽しんで “ブラッドリー･ヒトラー･スミス” “ブラッドリー･ヒトラー･スミス” “ブラッドリー･ヒトラー･スミス” 毎日が新鮮！ 毎日が新鮮！ 毎日が新鮮！ “サラ･リン”
“ボージャック･ホースマン”

translation.en: ♪ We were lost and now we're found ♪ ♪ And we're ♪
translation.ja: ボクらは もう　　　独りじゃない

translation.en: ♪ Horsin' Around ♪♪
translation.ja: 「馬(ば)か騒ぎ」！

translation.en: [narrator] Horsin' Around is filmed before a live studio audience.
translation.ja: 「馬(ば)か騒ぎ」は— 公開収録の番組です

translation.en: Eggs sunny side up, just like you like 'em.
translation.ja: 目玉焼きは焼き加減バッチリ

translation.en: The hash has been thoroughly browned
translation.ja: キツネもビックリこんがりポテト

translation.en: and your pancakes have extra chocolate chips.
translation.ja: チョコチップパンケーキも

translation.en: Any questions?
translation.ja: 質問は？

translation.en: Just the one. Who are you and what have you done with Olivia?
translation.ja: ある 君は一体 誰だ？

translation.en: Can't a sweet, young, lovable orphan
translation.ja: 大好きな おウマさんに

translation.en: make breakfast for her favorite horse
translation.ja: 大好きな おウマさんに 下心なしで朝食を作っただけ

translation.en: without having ulterior motives?
translation.ja: 下心なしで朝食を作っただけ

translation.en: You're right, I'm sorry, Olivia, this is very sweet.
translation.ja: ごめん　とてもうれしいよ

translation.en: And speaking of ulterior motives...
translation.ja: 下心と言えば思い出しちゃった…

translation.en: Well, I walked into that one.
translation.ja: やっぱ そう来たか

translation.en: That cute leather jacket I like is on sale at the galleria.
translation.ja: かわいい革ジャンがセール中なの

translation.en: As always, all roads lead to a cute leather jacket.
translation.ja: オリビア歩けば革ジャンに当たる

translation.en: I gotta say, I've never understood the appeal of fashionable clothing.
translation.ja: 流行の服なんて何がいいのか分かんない

translation.en: Um, that's the understatement of the century.
translation.ja: あんたのセンスは100年 古い

translation.en: Trends come and go,
translation.ja: 流行は すたる

translation.en: but give me a pair of sensible winter socks,
translation.ja: 僕は厚手の靴下が欲しい

translation.en: and for years to come, I can keep my tootsies toasty.
translation.ja: 何十年もボクのアンヨを暖めてくれる

translation.en: Haven't you kids ever heard that it's better to give than to receive?
translation.ja: 人にあげる方がいいんだぞ

translation.en: Well, by that logic, isn't giving you the opportunity
translation.ja: 私に革ジャンを贈らせてあげる

translation.en: to give me a leather jacket really the best gift of all?
translation.ja: 私からの最高のプレゼントじゃない？

translation.en: Well, I've heard of a one jacket mind,
translation.ja: まさか馬皮じゃないよな？

translation.en: but this is ridiculous.
translation.ja: 馬か馬かしいぜ

translation.en: "One jacket mind"? What the hell is a one jacket mind?
translation.ja: 馬皮なんてヒドイな

translation.en: I just want to look good
translation.ja: バイクの後ろに乗るなら—

translation.en: when I'm on the back of Joey Saratoga's motorcycle.
translation.ja: バイクの後ろに乗るなら— ジョーイ･サラトガって決めてるの

translation.en: Besides, I've never had a Christmas before
translation.ja: 初めてのクリスマスだから

translation.en: and I want to make sure this one's really special.
translation.ja: 本当に特別な日にしたいの

translation.en: Hold on, you mean to tell me you've never had a Christmas
translation.ja: 何だって？ 施設では祝わないのか？

translation.en: at the orphanage?
translation.ja: 施設では祝わないのか？

translation.en: What's a Christ... mas?
translation.ja: クリスモスって なーに？

translation.en: What's a Christmas?
translation.ja: 知らないのか？

translation.en: Only the most wonderful time of the year.
translation.ja: １年の最大イベントだぞ

translation.en: You hang up stockings, sing carols, and wait up for Santa Claus.
translation.ja: 靴下に賛美歌それにサンタだぞ

translation.en: What's a Santa Claus?
translation.ja: サンタって？

translation.en: What's a Santa Claus?
translation.ja: サンタって？

translation.en: Is there an echo in here?
translation.ja: こだまが聞こえたよ

translation.en: Santa Claus is the best.
translation.ja: サンタは すごいぞ

translation.en: He's this jolly old fat man who lives up at the North Pole,
translation.ja: 北極に住む太ったおじさんだ

translation.en: and every year he flies all over the world leaving presents for all the good boys and girls.
translation.ja: 毎年 世界中のよい子にプレゼントを配る

translation.en: We get presents just for being good?
translation.ja: プレゼントもらえるの？

translation.en: That's too much, man.
translation.ja: それ やり過ぎだろ

translation.en: [audience member] That's my favorite line!
translation.ja: 待ってました！

translation.en: That's right, but you have to be really good
translation.ja: でも よい子にだけだ

translation.en: because Santa Claus is always watching.
translation.ja: サンタは いつも見てる

translation.en: Even when we go to the bathroom?
translation.ja: トイレでも？

translation.en: That's too much, man.
translation.ja: それ やり過ぎだろ

translation.en: [audience member] Yeah, she said it again!
translation.ja: また言ってくれた！

translation.en: This Santa Claus guy sounds like a real piece of work.
translation.ja: そのサンタ かなりヤバイね

translation.en: Yowza-yowza-bo-bowza!
translation.ja: 絶対 間違いない！

translation.en: You kids just wait, this is gonna be the best Christmas you ever had.
translation.ja: 今までで最高のクリスマスにするぞ

translation.en: So, better than no Christmas?
translation.ja: なかった時よりも？

translation.en: A thousand times better.
translation.ja: 千倍だ

translation.en: A thousand times zero is still zero.
translation.ja: ゼロかける千はゼロだよ

translation.en: Ethan, you want those winter socks?
translation.ja: 靴下が欲しいか？

translation.en: Do I?
translation.ja: 欲しい

translation.en: Then don't be such a wise guy over here, eh?
translation.ja: だったら その減らず口を閉じたらどうだ？
“リベラトーレ･アソシエイツ”

translation.en: Is Mr. Liberatore in?
translation.ja: “リベラトーレ･アソシエイツ” リベラトーレさんを

translation.en: Look at you all business.
translation.ja: そっけないわね

translation.en: No, "Hello, Tracy. Your hair looks nice, Tracy. How's your mother, Tracy?"
translation.ja: いい髪形だとかお母さん元気とかないの？

translation.en: Ah, sorry, Trace, I'm just trying to get ahead so I don't have to work on Christmas this year.
translation.ja: 今年のクリスマスは休みたいんだ

translation.en: Since when do you care about workin' on Christmas?
translation.ja: あんたがクリスマスに休む？

translation.en: Are those little rug rats making you soft?
translation.ja: 子供が来て変わったわね

translation.en: No way, I'm still the top earner at this firm.
translation.ja: オレは今でも仕事人間(ウマ)だ

translation.en: I'll buzz Mr. Liberatore and let him know you're here.
translation.ja: ボスを呼ぶわ

translation.en: I know he wanted to check your progress on the Manzanita briefs.
translation.ja: あの訴訟の下準備はどう？

translation.en: Tracy, if you wanted to see my briefs, all you had to do was ask.
translation.ja: オレの下の準備のことならいつでも聞いてくれ

translation.en: Why, if I didn't know any better, I'd say you were flirting with me.
translation.ja: 私を口説けると思ってるの？

translation.en: [audience member] Kiss her!
translation.ja: キスしろ！

translation.en: Mr. Liberatore is gonna make me come in on Christmas, I can feel it.
translation.ja: クリスマスも休ませてくれない

translation.en: You know, he has got to be the meanest,
translation.ja: リベラトーレはヒドイ男だ

translation.en: snootiest, penny-pinchingest...
translation.ja: 気取りやがって カネの亡者(もうじゃ)だ

translation.en: And he's right behind me, isn't he?
translation.ja: 聞かれてるってオチ？

translation.en: [Mr. Liberatore] Actually, I'm listening over the intercom.
translation.ja: 内線で聞こえてるよ

translation.en: I can't say I'm not disappointed.
translation.ja: 君にはがっかりだ

translation.en: Time was, I thought you were a go-getter.
translation.ja: 仕事人間だと思ってたよ

translation.en: Hey, I go, I get.
translation.ja: 今でも仕事ウマだ

translation.en: Ever since those orphans moved in, you've become awfully distracted.
translation.ja: 子供たちが来てから浮ついてるぞ

translation.en: If you want to be made partner, you'll have to show some initiative.
translation.ja: 共同経営者になりたいんだろ

translation.en: You know, Jacob Goldstein's coming in on Christmas.
translation.ja: ゴールドシュタインは25日も働くぞ

translation.en: Jacob Goldstein's Jewish!
translation.ja: ユダヤ人だろ？

translation.en: He is?
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: The boys at the country club are not gonna like that.
translation.ja: ゴルフクラブには入れないな

translation.en: Anyway, you can spend Christmas morning
translation.ja: とにかく 午前中は休んでいいが午後は出てこい

translation.en: with your little tater tots, but I want you in here by the afternoon.
translation.ja: 午前中は休んでいいが午後は出てこい

translation.en: Remember, this is your career we're talking about.
translation.ja: 君のキャリアに関わるぞ

translation.en: It's quiet.
translation.ja: すっごい静か

translation.en: Too quiet.
translation.ja: 静かすぎる

translation.en: ♪ And a Goober in a pear tree ♪♪
translation.ja: 梨の木にとまる　　　グーバー参上

translation.en: Go home, Goober!
translation.ja: 家に帰れ　グーバー

translation.en: For your information, I was invited here personally
translation.ja: オレはボージャックに頼まれて来た

translation.en: by The Horse himself to sprinkle a little holiday magic
translation.ja: オレはボージャックに頼まれて来た 君たちのクリスマスの盛り上げ役さ

translation.en: into your dull, Gooberless lives.
translation.ja: 君たちのクリスマスの盛り上げ役さ 待たせたな

translation.en: Since when does Santa wear sunglasses?
translation.ja: サンタがサングラス？

translation.en: I thought it was time old Saint Nick
translation.ja: サンタも進化するのさ

translation.en: got a bit of an update, you know what I'm sayin'?
translation.ja: サンタも進化するのさ ナウいだろ

translation.en: Let me guess, instead of "Ho, Ho, Ho,"
translation.ja: ホーホーホーじゃなくて

translation.en: it's "Yo, Yo, Yo."
translation.ja: ヨーヨーヨー？

translation.en: And, uh, maybe later I could get you under the mistletoe-toe-toe?
translation.ja: ヤドリギの下でチュッチュッチュだ

translation.en: I've got three words for you Goober:
translation.ja: やめてよ　それって—

translation.en: no, no, no.
translation.ja: ゲーゲーゲーだわ

translation.en: [audience member] Kiss her!
translation.ja: キスしろ！

translation.en: All right, Sabrina, are you ready for the big surprise?
translation.ja: サブリナ目を開けたら驚くぞ

translation.en: A tree inside the house?
translation.ja: 家の中に木がある

translation.en: Now I've seen everything.
translation.ja: それだけかよ

translation.en: And that's not all. Look who came to visit.
translation.ja: この人は誰かな？

translation.en: Hey!
translation.ja: やあ！

translation.en: Go home, Goober.
translation.ja: 家に帰れ　グーバー

translation.en: No, that's not Goober, it's Santa.
translation.ja: 違うよ　サンタだ

translation.en: Please, I'd recognize that cologne anywhere.
translation.ja: コロンの匂いであいつだってバレバレ

translation.en: You had to wear the cologne.
translation.ja: 何やってんだ

translation.en: [Todd] Ha, classic Goober.
translation.ja: やっぱ グーバーはマヌケ

translation.en: Are you gonna keep talking? 'Cause I'll just pause it.
translation.ja: 止めるぞ

translation.en: Okay, okay, I won't talk.
translation.ja: 分かった　黙るよ

translation.en: You're getting into it, aren't you?
translation.ja: 夢中になってるな

translation.en: No, why are we doing this?
translation.ja: 見てやってるんだ

translation.en: You have to watch cheesy old holiday specials on Christmas, it's tradition.
translation.ja: クリスマスものは見るのが伝統さ

translation.en: Why? They're never any good.
translation.ja: くだらない

translation.en: Things don't become traditions because they're good, BoJack.
translation.ja: いいものは伝統にならない

translation.en: They become good because they're traditions.
translation.ja: 逆に 伝統はいいものになる

translation.en: You know, you can't just make yourself sound smart by saying things backwards.
translation.ja: 逆も何もまったく意味不明

translation.en: Oh, I can't, can't I?
translation.ja: そうかな？ そっか

translation.en: Still don't believe I let you talk me into this.
translation.ja: なんでこんな状況に

translation.en: And I still don't believe Goober ended up molesting all those Laker Girls.
translation.ja: レイカーガールズ食ったのグーバーだろ？

translation.en: Goober did not molest those Laker Girls,
translation.ja: グーバーじゃない

translation.en: the actor who played Goober molested those Laker Girls.
translation.ja: それはグーバー役の俳優だ

translation.en: Hey, this is nice, right?
translation.ja: なんか楽しくない？

translation.en: No, shut up.
translation.ja: うるさい　黙れ

translation.en: All right, all right, little lady, you got me.
translation.ja: そうさ　グーバーだよ

translation.en: But, uh, listen, I'm actually workin' for Santa
translation.ja: オレはサンタの助手の１人さ

translation.en: as one of his helpers, so anything you say to me
translation.ja: オレはサンタの助手の１人さ あの大男へ伝言を伝えてあげるぜ

translation.en: I can relay to the big man himself.
translation.ja: あの大男へ伝言を伝えてあげるぜ

translation.en: Is there anything you want to ask Santa for? Now's your chance, anything you want.
translation.ja: サンタさんにお願いするチャンスだ

translation.en: Well, I guess what I really want is a personalized pencil set.
translation.ja: 名前入りの鉛筆セットが欲しいな

translation.en: A pencil set? Sabrina!
translation.ja: 鉛筆セット？

translation.en: At the orphanage, I always had to share everything.
translation.ja: 施設では何でも共有だったから

translation.en: If I pencils that had my name on them, everyone would know,
translation.ja: 名前が入ってれば私のって分かる

translation.en: "Hey, these pencils are Sabrina's! Hands off, bumsky!"
translation.ja: “サブリナの鉛筆だ触るなよ！”って

translation.en: I don't think you're getting this whole Christmas thing.
translation.ja: 他に欲しいものは？

translation.en: You can ask for anything, you don't have to be shy.
translation.ja: 何でもお願いできるんだ

translation.en: Well, I guess I wouldn't mind a Pretty Pony Princess play set.
translation.ja: ポニーのプリンセスセットも欲しい

translation.en: Now you're thinking Christmas. Keep going, what do you want
translation.ja: これこそクリスマスだ

translation.en: more than anything else in the world?
translation.ja: 一番 欲しい物は？

translation.en: I can ask Santa for anything?
translation.ja: 何でもいいの？

translation.en: Anything at all.
translation.ja: そうだよ

translation.en: And if I'm good, Santa has to give it to me?
translation.ja: いい子は何でももらえるの？

translation.en: That's the deal, as long as you're good,
translation.ja: いい子にしてれば—

translation.en: all your Christmas dreams will come true.
translation.ja: どんな望みも叶うよ

translation.en: Okay, I know what I want.
translation.ja: 分かったお願いはね…

translation.en: Santa, I want my Mommy and Daddy to come back.
translation.ja: ママとパパに帰ってきて欲しい！

translation.en: This is gonna be the best Christmas ever.
translation.ja: 最高のクリスマスになるね！

translation.en: [Todd] Look how sad you are, you're a really good actor.
translation.ja: 絶妙な表情だお前 いい役者だな

translation.en: Are you gonna interrupt every five minutes? Because I will ask you to leave.
translation.ja: いちいち感想を言うなら帰れ

translation.en: And spend Christmas by yourself?
translation.ja: 独りで過ごすのか？

translation.en: No one should be alone on Christmas. Did we learn nothing from John McClane in "Die Hard"?
translation.ja: 独りはダメだ「ダイ･ハード」がいい例だ

translation.en: John McClane was alone on Christmas, that's how he saved the day.
translation.ja: 独りで戦ったから助かったんだ

translation.en: He wasn't alone, he had that cop helping him, the dad from Family Matters.
translation.ja: 「ファミリー･マターズ」の野郎が相棒だった

translation.en: That wasn't the dad from Family Matters, it was just the same actor.
translation.ja: 同じ俳優が演じた別の作品だ

translation.en: I'm pretty sure it's supposed to be the same character, they're both cops.
translation.ja: あれは絶対 同じキャラだよ

translation.en: Yeah, but one was a cop in Los Angeles and the other was a cop in Chicago.
translation.ja: 両方とも警官だが舞台が違う

translation.en: Maybe he moved.
translation.ja: 引越しだよ

translation.en: He didn't move, they had different names!
translation.ja: 役名も違うだろ

translation.en: Witness Protection.
translation.ja: 証人保護プログラムか

translation.en: Hey, this is nice, right?
translation.ja: なあ なんか楽しくない？

translation.en: No!
translation.ja: 全然

translation.en: Oh, Charles Krauthammer, you have done it again.
translation.ja: チャールズ･クラウトハマーまたかよ

translation.en: Yes, Mr. Liberatore. Of course, Mr. Liberatore, I'll get right on it, sir.
translation.ja: リベラトーレさんすぐに対応します

translation.en: Yeesh, I've heard of being a work horse,
translation.ja: “馬車馬のように働け”ってことか

translation.en: but this is ridiculous.
translation.ja: 馬か馬かしいぜ

translation.en: I just hate that he's making you work on Christmas.
translation.ja: クリスマスまで働かせるなんて

translation.en: What is this, Communist Russia?
translation.ja: まさかロシアの共産党員？

translation.en: I know, it's a bummer, but we can find other times to be together.
translation.ja: また別の日に家族で過ごそう

translation.en: Hey, maybe I'll chaperone your prom.
translation.ja: 卒業パーティーのお目付け役は？

translation.en: I can meet all your friends, talk you up to this Joey Saratoga fella,
translation.ja: 友達やサラトガにも会えるし

translation.en: maybe even take a spin on the dance floor.
translation.ja: ダンスも踊れるぞ

translation.en: You know, back in my day, I could really bust the regular move.
translation.ja: こう見えて 昔はよく踊ったものさ

translation.en: Well, just got done shoveling the walk!
translation.ja: 歩道の雪かき終わったよ

translation.en: I'm being really good just so there's no confusion for Santa
translation.ja: サンタに願いごとしたから—

translation.en: over whether or not he should make my Christmas wish come true.
translation.ja: いい子にしてるんだ

translation.en: Santa, if you're listening, I'm Sabrina!
translation.ja: サンタさん　聞いてる？サブリナだよ

translation.en: Sabrina, I'm glad you're getting into the Christmas spirit,
translation.ja: クリスマスを楽しんでるね

translation.en: but, you know, bringing your parents back is a pretty tall order.
translation.ja: でもパパとママは来られないよ

translation.en: Not for Santa. Santa can do anything,
translation.ja: サンタは何でもできるの

translation.en: just as long as I believe, right, guys?
translation.ja: 信じてれば願いは叶うよね？

translation.en: You wanna handle this one?
translation.ja: ウマく説得して

translation.en: Sabrina, there are some things even Santa can't do.
translation.ja: サンタにもできないことがある

translation.en: Okay, I get what's happening.
translation.ja: また そんなこと言って

translation.en: You're trying to make me think Santa won't bring me my Mommy and Daddy
translation.ja: パパとママが来ないと思わせたいのね

translation.en: so that when he does, I'll be even more surprised.
translation.ja: パパとママが来ないと思わせたいのね その方が感動するから

translation.en: Just when I thought Christmas couldn't get any more magical.
translation.ja: がっかりさせて奇跡を起こす

translation.en: See you later!
translation.ja: また あとでね

translation.en: I've heard of great Christmas expectations,
translation.ja: クリスマスは希望の日だけど—

translation.en: but this is ridiculous.
translation.ja: これは馬か馬かしい

translation.en: Now no matter what Santa brings, she'll go from "reindeer" to "reindon't."
translation.ja: サンタが何を持ってきてもメリー“クルシミマス”だ

translation.en: What are we gonna do?
translation.ja: どうしよう

translation.en: Horse, maybe you should tell her that her parents aren't coming.
translation.ja: 親は来ないって正直に伝えたら？

translation.en: I can't do that, she'll never believe in Santa Claus again.
translation.ja: サンタを信じなくなる

translation.en: And we're sure Santa can't bring people back from the dead?
translation.ja: 死んだ人を連れ戻すなんてムリよ

translation.en: On Dancer, on Prancer, on Necromancer?
translation.ja: サンタがゾンビを連れてくるのか？

translation.en: I'm thinkin' no.
translation.ja: 連れてこないね

translation.en: Oh, my God, I got it.
translation.ja: 思いついた

translation.en: Maybe if we can trick her into being bad,
translation.ja: サブリナに悪いことさせて—

translation.en: she'll think Santa's mad at her.
translation.ja: サンタを怒らせる

translation.en: That way, when Christmas comes and her parents don't show up,
translation.ja: パパとママが来なくても

translation.en: she'll just think it's her own fault.
translation.ja: 自分のせいだと思う

translation.en: Brilliant! She'll still believe in Santa,
translation.ja: 名案だ それならサンタを信じ続けるし—

translation.en: plus she'll be extra well-behaved for the whole year
translation.ja: それならサンタを信じ続けるし— １年中 いい子でいるぞ

translation.en: so she doesn't blow it again.
translation.ja: １年中 いい子でいるぞ

translation.en: Hold on, you kids want me to trick Sabrina into being bad
translation.ja: 待て サブリナをだまして—

translation.en: just so she won't stop believing Santa?
translation.ja: 悪さをさせるのか？

translation.en: Never in a million years would I resort to something so low.
translation.ja: オレは そんな酷いことできない

translation.en: No, we better keep brainstorming
translation.ja: 却下！ 他の方法を考えるぞだますなんてダメだ

translation.en: because I am definitely not doing that idea.
translation.ja: 他の方法を考えるぞだますなんてダメだ

translation.en: How desperate do you think I am?
translation.ja: オレを見くびるなよ

translation.en: You are really scraping the bottom of the barrel with that one.
translation.ja: 最低最悪なアイデアだな

translation.en: No, I will clearly not be pursuing that line of action.
translation.ja: いや やっぱりダメだその案はボツ

translation.en: No way, no how.
translation.ja: 絶対 却下だからな

translation.en: So, you want me to sit here and watch the cookies but not eat them?
translation.ja: ここに座ってクッキーを見てるの？

translation.en: This seems like a trick.
translation.ja: 何かのワナ？

translation.en: [audience member] He's doing the thing he said he wasn't gonna do!
translation.ja: 何だよ　結局やるのかよ

translation.en: These cookies are for Santa.
translation.ja: サンタのクッキーだ

translation.en: If anyone eats them, he'll be really mad. I need you to guard them.
translation.ja: これを食べられたらサンタがマジギレだぞ

translation.en: It's a very important job.
translation.ja: だから見張っててくれ

translation.en: Well, I guess it is about time I start earning my keep around here.
translation.ja: あたしも自分で稼いで自立する時が来たのね

translation.en: I knew I could count on you.
translation.ja: 頼りにしてるよ

translation.en: Remember, no matter what, don't eat these delicious,
translation.ja: いいかほっぺが落ちるほどウマい

translation.en: home made, fresh out of the oven, warm, gooey, chocolate chip delights.
translation.ja: 焼きたての手作りチョコチップクッキーだ

translation.en: I'll leave you here alone... with these cookies...
translation.ja: 頼んだよ 目の前には—

translation.en: which are delicious.
translation.ja: おいしいクッキー

translation.en: Okay, cookies, it's just you and me.
translation.ja: クッキーとあたし ２人きり

translation.en: Ooh, they look so yummy.
translation.ja: すごく おいしそう

translation.en: What would Mommy and Daddy say?
translation.ja: パパとママなら…

translation.en: "Sabrina, I'm your Daddy and I say, 'Don't eat the cookies!'"
translation.ja: “サブリナ　絶対食べちゃダメだぞ”

translation.en: "Listen to your Father, honey, he knows what's best."
translation.ja: “パパの言うことをちゃんと聞きなさい”

translation.en: Okay, Mommy and Daddy, I love you.
translation.ja: 分かったパパもママも大好き

translation.en: I don't think she's taking the bait.
translation.ja: 食いつかないな

translation.en: That's because you didn't put any milk out.
translation.ja: 牛乳がないからよ

translation.en: You can't have cookies without milk. That's like Wang without the Chung.
translation.ja: クッキーには牛乳ウマには人参でしょ

translation.en: Any chance she'll crack?
translation.ja: なるほどね

translation.en: I'd say your odds are about as good as a democrat being elected president.
translation.ja: 民主党が政権を握るほど不可能な話だ

translation.en: Yeesh, I've heard of "lookie, lookie, don't eat the cookie,"
translation.ja: ウマいクッキーなのに

translation.en: but this is ridiculous.
translation.ja: 馬か馬かしい

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: You guys got any other bright ideas?
translation.ja: 他に案はないのか？

translation.en: Maybe I should go eat the cookies?
translation.ja: 私がクッキーを食べるってのはどう？

translation.en: Well, if she's not gonna, somebody should.
translation.ja: 誰かが食べないともったいない

translation.en: [Olivia] Oh, my God, it's Christmas!
translation.ja: やったぁ　クリスマスよ

translation.en: [Ethan] Oh, it's Christmas!
translation.ja: やったぁ　クリスマスよ プレゼントだ

translation.en: Yes, sensible winter socks!
translation.ja: やったぜ　厚手の靴下！

translation.en: You knew!
translation.ja: さすが！

translation.en: Ooh, what could this be?
translation.ja: 私のプレゼントは何かしら？

translation.en: Well, I wanted to make sure you look really cool on the back of that motorcycle.
translation.ja: バイクの後ろに乗る時あるとカッコいいやつさ

translation.en: You didn't! You didn't!
translation.ja: ウソ！　もしかして…

translation.en: You didn't.
translation.ja: まさかのこれ？

translation.en: Motorcycle crashes are one of the leading causes of brain injury.
translation.ja: 頭のケガがもっとも怖いんだ

translation.en: If Joey Saratoga doesn't care about this,
translation.ja: 君のここを守りたいから—

translation.en: then Joey Saratoga doesn't care about you.
translation.ja: これを被(かぶ)って欲しい

translation.en: Wow, this present shows you really care,
translation.ja: 私のことが大切ってこと？

translation.en: so in a way it's even cooler than a new leather jacket.
translation.ja: 革ジャンよりずっとステキなプレゼント

translation.en: Take it from me, being safe is totally radical.
translation.ja: 安全ってのはカッコいいことなんだ

translation.en: Is this my present?
translation.ja: これは あたしの？

translation.en: It's a Pretty Pony Princess play set, just like you asked for.
translation.ja: ポニーのプリンセスセットだ

translation.en: Is that it?
translation.ja: これだけ？

translation.en: Well, it's pretty cool.
translation.ja: かわいいだろ？

translation.en: She comes with a tiara and everything.
translation.ja: ティアラもあるし

translation.en: Oh, okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: And cue the waterworks in 30, 29, 28...
translation.ja: 涙が出る30秒前 30　29　28…

translation.en: ...four, three, two...
and...
translation.ja: さーて

translation.en: Hey, what's this?
translation.ja: 何これ？ “サブリナへ”

translation.en: A letter? Who could this be from?
translation.ja: “サブリナへ” 手紙だ 誰からだ？

translation.en: Open it, Sabrina.
translation.ja: 開けてみて

translation.en: Oh, wow.
translation.ja: オウ　ワーオ

translation.en: Wow! Wow!
translation.ja: ワーオ　ワーオゥ！

translation.en: What does it say?
translation.ja: 何だって？

translation.en: How should I know? I can't read.
translation.ja: 読めるわけないでしょ

translation.en: "Dear Sabrina, this is a letter from your parents.
translation.ja: “愛するサブリナへ” “ママとパパだよ”

translation.en: Even though we can't be with you on Christmas, we're in heaven looking down on you
translation.ja: “一緒に過ごせないけど天国から見守ってる”

translation.en: and we want you to know we love you very much.
translation.ja: “お前を愛してるよ”

translation.en: You are a good girl and we are very proud of you.
translation.ja: “私たちの自慢の娘だ”

translation.en: Love, Your Mommy and Daddy."
translation.ja: “愛を込めてママとパパより”

translation.en: Isn't that great, Sabrina?
translation.ja: よかったね　サブリナ

translation.en: A letter from your Mom and Dad.
translation.ja: お手紙が来るなんて

translation.en: -No, that's not what I asked for. -Sabrina--
translation.ja: お願いしたのは手紙じゃない サブリナ

translation.en: I didn't want a stupid letter, I wanted my Mommy and Daddy.
translation.ja: 手紙じゃなくて 会いたい

translation.en: I know you're upset, but--
translation.ja: 気持ちは分かるが…

translation.en: I hate this.
translation.ja: こんなのヤダ

translation.en: I hate Santa Claus and I hate trees
translation.ja: サンタもツリーもキライ

translation.en: and I hate you and I hate Christmas!
translation.ja: あんたもクリスマスも大キライ！

translation.en: Was it something I said?
translation.ja: 僕 何か悪いこと言った？

translation.en: Why would it be something Ethan said?
translation.ja: そうだったのか？

translation.en: No, that's the joke, it wasn't something Ethan said, that's why it's funny.
translation.ja: イーサンの案じゃないだから笑えるんだ

translation.en: Oh.
translation.ja: なるほどね

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: そっか

translation.en: Can I come in?
translation.ja: 入っていい？

translation.en: Even if I say no, it's not like anyone ever listens to what I want.
translation.ja: 聞くだけであたしの気持ちは無視でしょ

translation.en: Sabrina, I really screwed things up.
translation.ja: がっかりさせて悪かった

translation.en: I got so excited trying to make you excited,
translation.ja: つい 張り切りすぎて—

translation.en: I forgot the true meaning of Christmas.
translation.ja: 本当の意味を忘れていた

translation.en: Christmas isn't about getting everything you want.
translation.ja: 贈り物を もらう日じゃない

translation.en: It's about being around the people that care about you.
translation.ja: 大好きな人と過ごす日だ

translation.en: I did everything right.
translation.ja: いい子だったのに

translation.en: Why wouldn't Santa Claus want me to be happy?
translation.ja: 願いを叶えてくれなかった

translation.en: I'm sure he does, he just--
translation.ja: 叶えてくれるよ サンタが やることには意味がある

translation.en: Santa Claus works in mysterious ways.
translation.ja: サンタが やることには意味がある

translation.en: It's like when I make you eat vegetables. Sure, they taste yucky,
translation.ja: オレが野菜を食べろって言うだろ？

translation.en: but you have to trust that I know what's good for you.
translation.ja: マズくても君のためだからだ

translation.en: So, Santa Claus made my parents dead because he thinks it's good for me?
translation.ja: あたしのためにパパとママを死なせたの？

translation.en: Yeah-- No!
translation.ja: そうだ　違う！

translation.en: Santa Claus didn't make your parents dead.
translation.ja: サンタは関係ない

translation.en: But he didn't save them either.
translation.ja: 助けもしなかった

translation.en: No, he-- That's not how Santa works.
translation.ja: 違う　サンタのせいじゃない

translation.en: You said Santa Claus is always watching,
translation.ja: サンタは全部見てるんでしょ

translation.en: so if he's watching why doesn't he help us?
translation.ja: なんで助けなかったの？

translation.en: Does he enjoy watching us be sad?
translation.ja: 人の悲しい顔 見て興奮してるの？

translation.en: Is that how he gets his kicks?
translation.ja: 人の悲しい顔 見て興奮してるの？ 違う

translation.en: Are we all just pawns in Santa's sick game?
translation.ja: あたしを操ってる？

translation.en: What kind of pervert is he?
translation.ja: あの変態ジジイ！

translation.en: Oh, no, Santa's watching us right now!
translation.ja: ヤバイ！サンタに聞かれた

translation.en: I'm sorry, Santa! I didn't mean it.
translation.ja: ごめんね　サンタ今のは冗談だよ

translation.en: Please don't hurt the people I love.
translation.ja: 誰も殺さないで

translation.en: No, Sabrina, Santa Claus isn't real.
translation.ja: サンタなんて いないんだ

translation.en: -What? -[audience groans]
translation.ja: 何それ？

translation.en: He's a lie that grownups made up because we like to believe that
translation.ja: サンタは大人が作ったおとぎ話だ

translation.en: there's an order to the universe and that good behavior will lead to happiness,
translation.ja: 皆 夢を信じたいだけで

translation.en: but the fact is that just isn't true.
translation.ja: 実際は いないんだ

translation.en: [audience member] What?
translation.ja: マジ？

translation.en: You can't be good just because you think some fat guy in a red suit is gonna bring you presents.
translation.ja: 赤い服着たオッサンのためじゃなくて—

translation.en: You have to be good just to be good. That's all there is.
translation.ja: 贈り物がなくてもいい子でいなきゃ

translation.en: Whoa.
translation.ja: そっか…

translation.en: Look, I don't know why things happen,
translation.ja: 運命なんて分からない

translation.en: I don't know why some people get everything and some people are orphans.
translation.ja: 運がいい人も親がいない子もいる

translation.en: All I know is I spent last Christmas alone at my office.
translation.ja: 去年の今日オレは独りで仕事してた

translation.en: I didn't get a tree, I didn't put up any decorations or sing carols,
translation.ja: もみの木も 飾りも歌もなかった

translation.en: and I didn't try to get any little girls to believe in Santa Claus.
translation.ja: 女の子にサンタの話なんてしなかった

translation.en: Sabrina, you and Olivia and Ethan are the best things that have ever happened to me,
translation.ja: 君たち３人に会えたのは最高の出来事だ

translation.en: and if it took your parents dying for you to be part of my life, well, then I'm glad your parents died.
translation.ja: パパとママが死んだから君に出会えたんだ

translation.en: Oh, you don't mean that.
translation.ja: またまたー

translation.en: No, I do, I'm glad your parents are dead and are never coming back.
translation.ja: パパとママが帰ってこなくてうれしいのさ

translation.en: Well, when you put it that way, I guess I am, too.
translation.ja: そこまで言われると あたしも うれしい

translation.en: I know that sometimes I make a mess of this whole thing,
translation.ja: たまに考えるんだ 仕事も恋も頑張りたいのに

translation.en: a horse raising three human kids while also
translation.ja: 仕事も恋も頑張りたいのに

translation.en: juggling work and trying to have a love life thing,
translation.ja: ３人の子供を育てるウマって…

translation.en: but there's one more present.
translation.ja: ３人の子供を育てるウマって… 渡したい物が

translation.en: Is it from Santa Claus?
translation.ja: それ サンタから？

translation.en: No, it's from me.
translation.ja: 違う　オレからだ

translation.en: Wow, pencils!
translation.ja: 鉛筆セットだ

translation.en: What do they say?
translation.ja: これは？

translation.en: Sound it out.
translation.ja: 読んでごらん

translation.en: Sa... Sab...
translation.ja: サ… サブ

translation.en: Sabrin...
translation.ja: サブ… “サブリナ”

translation.en: rine...
translation.ja: “サブリナ” ライナ…

translation.en: rine...
translation.ja: “サブリナ” “サブリナ” ライナ…

translation.en: Sab...
translation.ja: サブ…

translation.en: Sabrine...
translation.ja: サブライナ…

translation.en: Sabrinay.
translation.ja: サブライネ…

translation.en: Sabrinay.
translation.ja: サブライネイ

translation.en: -It says Sabrina. -Oh!
translation.ja: サブリナだよ

translation.en: I can't bring your Mommy and Daddy back,
translation.ja: パパとママは来ないけど

translation.en: but as long as I'm around, you'll always have a place to keep your pencils.
translation.ja: オレがいる限り君は君の鉛筆を使えるよ

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Maybe it's just because I never had a Christmas before,
translation.ja: クリスマスは初めてだけど

translation.en: but this is the best Christmas I've ever had.
translation.ja: 今までで最高のクリスマス

translation.en: Me, too.
translation.ja: オレもだよ

translation.en: Olivia, Ethan, look what I got!
translation.ja: オリビア　イーサンこれ見て！

translation.en: [Mr. Liberatore] Hello?
translation.ja: もしもし

translation.en: Listen, Mr. Liberatore,
translation.ja: リベラトーレさん

translation.en: I've given it a lot of thought and I'm not-- Well, I'm not comin' in to work today.
translation.ja: 悩みましたが今日は仕事を休みます

translation.en: If I have to choose between my career and the people I care about,
translation.ja: 家族と仕事を選べと言われたら—

translation.en: well, then I'm sorry, but I'm putting people first.
translation.ja: 家族と仕事を選べと言われたら— 家族を選びます

translation.en: [Mr. Liberatore] You know, it took guts to call in and tell me that,
translation.ja: なるほど 大した度胸の持ち主だ

translation.en: the kind of guts we need on our executive board.
translation.ja: その勇気こそ我が社に必要だ

translation.en: If that Scrooge, Jacob Goldstein, wants to work on Christmas,
translation.ja: ゴールドシュタインが25日に働きたいなら

translation.en: he can work somewhere else!
translation.ja: 他で働けばいい

translation.en: [audience member] Fire that Jew!
translation.ja: クビにしろー！

translation.en: I'm making you partner.
translation.ja: 君が共同経営者だ

translation.en: Well, I'm really glad to hear that, Mr. Liberatore.
translation.ja: うれしい お言葉です

translation.en: Now if you'll excuse me, I have to go spend Christmas with the people I love.
translation.ja: 愛する家族と過ごすのでこれで失礼します

translation.en: Hi, I'm a Pretty Pony Princess.
translation.ja: 私はポニープリンセス

translation.en: I'm a pencil.
translation.ja: ボクは鉛筆だ

translation.en: Well, I guess everything turned out okay.
translation.ja: これで丸く収まったな

translation.en: How'd you get her to come back down?
translation.ja: 一体 何したの？

translation.en: Let's just say I made her
translation.ja: 何したかって？ 決して断れないオファーをしたのさ

translation.en: an offer she couldn't refuse.
translation.ja: 決して断れないオファーをしたのさ

translation.en: Yowza-yowza-bo-bowza!
translation.ja: 絶対 間違いない！

translation.en: Well, I gotta hand it to you,
translation.ja: とにかく見直した

translation.en: even though it didn't work, that letter you wrote was really something.
translation.ja: あなたが書いた あの手紙すごくよかった

translation.en: I didn't write that letter. I thought you wrote that letter.
translation.ja: オレじゃない　君だろ？

translation.en: I didn't write the letter.
translation.ja: あたしじゃないわ

translation.en: Wasn't me.
translation.ja: 僕じゃないよ

translation.en: Then where'd it come from?
translation.ja: じゃあ　誰が書いたんだ？
“「馬(ば)か騒ぎ」よりメリークリスマス！”

translation.en: Well, that sucked.
translation.ja: くだらねえ

translation.en: So the letter was actually from her parents?
translation.ja: 死人からの手紙だったの？

translation.en: Uh, I think it was from Santa.
translation.ja: いや　サンタからだろ

translation.en: That's why there was a "ho, ho, ho" voice at the end.
translation.ja: 最後に“ホーホーホー”って

translation.en: So in the world of this show, there is a Santa.
translation.ja: 結局サンタはいるってこと？

translation.en: No, I don't know, we were all on cocaine.
translation.ja: コカインで幻聴が聞こえたんだ

translation.en: God, I can't believe I spent nine years of my life making that dumb show.
translation.ja: ９年も あんな番組をやってたとは

translation.en: It wasn't all dumb, BoJack.
translation.ja: 役にも立ってたよ

translation.en: The episode where Sabrina had a black friend
translation.ja: サブリナに黒人の友達ができた回では

translation.en: really started the conversation about racism.
translation.ja: サブリナに黒人の友達ができた回では 人種差別の問題

translation.en: And the episode where Ethan looked directly at a solar eclipse really started the conversation
translation.ja: イーサンが日食をサングラスなしで見た回は

translation.en: about not looking directly at a solar eclipse.
translation.ja: いい教訓になったし

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: まあな

translation.en: Well, anyway, Merry Christmas.
translation.ja: とにかくメリークリスマス

translation.en: I know, it's really just another day
translation.ja: ほんとは普通の日なのに

translation.en: in a year full of days,
translation.ja: ほんとは普通の日なのに オレ達が勝手に特別な日だと思ってるだけさ

translation.en: nothing all that special about it other than the significance we give it,
translation.ja: オレ達が勝手に特別な日だと思ってるだけさ

translation.en: but still, I'm glad I got to spend part of the day with you, BoJack.
translation.ja: でも 一緒に過ごせてうれしいよ

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.ja: ホントか？ ああ

translation.en: Hey, um, Horsin' Around had eight other Christmas episodes.
translation.ja: あのさ… クリスマスものがまだ８話ある

translation.en: If you're not doing anything else today, we could watch another one,
translation.ja: よかったら一緒に見ないか？

translation.en: I mean, just to see how stupid it is.
translation.ja: くだらないけど

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
translation.ja: いいよ でも しゃべるなよ

translation.en: But don't talk in the middle of it.
translation.ja: でも しゃべるなよ

translation.en: -Zip! -You can talk a little bit.
translation.ja: チャック！ 少しなら いいけど

translation.en: -Don't be weird about it. -Okay.
translation.ja: 少しなら いいけど 分かったよ

translation.en: Hey, after we watch "Horsin' Around," can we make holiday cookies?
translation.ja: このあと クッキー作ろうぜ

translation.en: [BoJack] No.
translation.ja: イヤだ

translation.en: -[Todd] Can we sing carols? -[BoJack] No.
translation.ja: 賛美歌は？ イヤだ

translation.en: -Can we roast a Christmas goose? -No.
translation.ja: ガチョウの丸焼き？ イヤだ

translation.en: -Can we play dreidel? -No.
translation.ja: コマ遊び？ イヤだ

translation.en: -Can we get a tree? -No.
translation.ja: もみの木？ イヤだ

translation.en: -Doesn't have to be a Christmas tree. -Still no.
translation.ja: 飾ろうよ イヤだ

translation.en: -Can we be visited by three spirits? -No.
translation.ja: 精霊が訪ねてくるかな 来ない

translation.en: -Can we be visited by three kings? -No.
translation.ja: じゃあ 王は？ 来ない

translation.en: -Can we go outside and make snow angels? -What snow? It's 72 degrees out.
translation.ja: 外に出て雪で遊ぶ？ 気温は22度　快晴

translation.en: -Can we make driveway gravel angels? -No.
translation.ja: 砂場で遊ぶ？ イヤだ

translation.en: -Can we drink eggnog? -No.
translation.ja: エッグノッグ飲む？ 飲まない

translation.en: -Bourbon and eggnog? -No.
translation.ja: バーボン入り？ 飲まない

translation.en: -What about just bourbon? -Fine.
translation.ja: バーボンは？ 飲む
